roleset.name: understand completely

example.name: Transitive
example.text: I'm-1 just trying *PRO*-1 to fathom the mess we're going to have if this isn't settled.
example.arg: the mess we're going to have

roleset.note: Based on Webtext 2.5-2. Member of VNcls comprehend-87.2-1. Comparison with 'comprehend.'
